title: LFT - ADC Main
body:
I have previous experience in teams, have proof of previous ranks and teams i've been on too :) Please add, willing to trial.

Summoner Name: Vicenza
Age: 20(just turned 20)
Current Rank: Diamond V
Season 6/5 Rank: Plat season 6 after quiting for a bit, season 5 was diamond 3 and in challenger team.
Top 5 champions: Draven, Ezreal, Vayne, Cait, Twitch
Also love: Kalista, Lucian, Jhin, basically every single adc.
Availability during the week: 
Weekdays: 6:30pm + everyday
Weekends: 24/7

Thanks for your time.

replies.body: Currently have a team in my discord that is in need of a ADC role, if interested join https://discord.gg/Y93kJJN
haha thanks man :P look forward to facing you ! ^_^
